column5: Does anyone know any haliburton lakes that you can fish trout year round that are safe right now looking to head out friday .thanks in advance for any replies

I was up there last weekend and saw guys out on North Pigeon in Lutterworth, don't know how much ice they had, it's open all year although the fishing is tough, you could also check out Devils, Little Bob and Cedar (Sludge) (rainbows), all are smaller lakes, that should have ice (be careful though) and are open all season  let us know how you do
apreciate the info thanks chris will post on my return
